goal.util

Interface Observable<OBS extends Observer<SRC,OBJ>,SRC,OBJ>

  • Type Parameters:
    OBS - observer of OBJects coming from SRC
    SRC - the type of the event source of OBJs
    OBJ - the type of event objects created by this observable.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultObservable, RuntimeManager

    public interface Observable<OBS extends Observer<SRC,OBJ>,SRC,OBJ>
    generic interface for observable functionality. Thread safe.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 16jan2014 #2773

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(OBS observer)
      Add a new observer.
      void notifyObservers(SRC src, OBJ obj)
      notify all our observers of some event.
      void removeObserver(OBS observer)
      Remove an observer.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(OBS observer)
        Add a new observer. Nothing happens if observer already there.
        Parameters:
        observer -

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(OBS observer)
        Remove an observer. Nothing happens if observer not there.
        Parameters:
        observer -

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(SRC src,
                   OBJ obj)
        notify all our observers of some event. This notifies all observers available at the moment of the call. If the set of observers changes DURING the notifyAll handling, this change will be ignored.
